advancements.herbalbrews.all_effects.des: Experience the potent effects of all brews at once.
effect.herbalbrews.bonding.description: Boosts absorption and regeneration for nearby players.
effect.herbalbrews.deeprush.description: Speeds up mining based on depth for nearby players.
effect.herbalbrews.feral.description: Increases attack damage and armor for nearby players.
effect.herbalbrews.fortune.description: Improves luck for better loot for nearby players.
effect.herbalbrews.lifeleech.description: Transfers health from enemies to the player.
effect.herbalbrews.tough.description: Provides resistance and regeneration at low health for nearby players.
herbalbrews.advancement.cauldron.desc: Begin your journey as a master brewer by crafting a magical Brewing Cauldron.
herbalbrews.advancement.coffee.desc: Enjoy a warm cup of freshly brewed coffee.
herbalbrews.advancement.craft_everything: Savor the joy of brewing by crafting every tea and coffee blend—become the ultimate brewer!
herbalbrews.advancement.drink_milk_coffe: Combine a cup of coffee with a milk bucket to brew the perfect drink.
herbalbrews.advancement.dry.desc: Discover the secrets of green tea by drying leaves under the sun.
herbalbrews.advancement.dry_2.desc: Dark and bold—experience the next level of tea craftsmanship.
herbalbrews.advancement.dry_3.desc: When opposites meet: a harmonious blend of green and black tea.
herbalbrews.advancement.find_lavender.de: Seek out the soothing scent of lavender in the cool embrace of the mountains.
herbalbrews.advancement.find_tea_blossom: Find Tea Blossoms by carefully breaking flowers with shears.
herbalbrews.advancement.flask.desc: Unleash the essence of herbs in your first brewed Flask.
herbalbrews.advancement.jug.desc: Craft a Jug and start filling it with your finest brews.
herbalbrews.advancement.stove.desc: Prepare the perfect heat for your brewing adventures with a Stove.
herbalbrews.advancement.tea_kettle.desc: Set the stage for the perfect brew with a Tea Kettle.
herbalbrews.advancement.witching_time.de: Channel your inner witch by finding or crafting a Witch Hat.
text.autoconfig.herbalbrews.option.block: Note: Only affects Cauldron brewing. Tea Kettle Recipe Duration must be adjusted in the Recipe .json file.
text.autoconfig.herbalbrews.title: HerbalBrews
tooltip.herbalbrews.banner.thankyou_1: A reward for crafting all Tea Variants
tooltip.herbalbrews.banner.thankyou_3: Thank you for playing Herbal Brews!
tooltip.herbalbrews.banner.thankyou_4: Grants Absorption in a radius of 8 blocks
tooltip.herbalbrews.description.jug_1: You can fill the jug with up to three different §6[Teas]§r.
tooltip.herbalbrews.description.jug_2: §e[Right-Click]§r to drink from the jug. You will gain all §6[Effects]§r of the infused §6[Teas]§r.
tooltip.herbalbrews.description.title: Usage:
tooltip.herbalbrews.tea_kettle.heat_incr: Add §e[Blaze Powder]§r to raise Heat levels
